This problem didn't exist with 20020918.

---8<--- console ---

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.RuntimeException: Fatal Error: Unable to

For some reason, org.eclipse.core.runtime wasn't considered a binary project, 
and didn't get imported (was still sitting on 2.0.0 instead of 2.1.0).
It works now.
